\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[76100419ded65de5176c361a72d8235b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={60}
B_{\leq2} = \emptyset + \circ\times \cdot B_{\leq2} + \bullet\circ \cdot B_{\leq2} 
+\bullet\bullet\circ \cdot B_{\leq2}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={63}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[59e23d24b1c0fc680c52b781f7c52136]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={65}
B_{\leq2}(z) = 1 + z\cdot B_{\leq 2}(z) + z^2\cdot B_{\leq 2}(z)+z^3 B_{\leq2}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={67}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[03b813d449780dc7000064dd40b5bf64]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={69}
B_{\leq2}(z)  = \frac{1}{1 - z - z^2 - z^3}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={82}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[36219a14f7414d3c3884512d6012ec17]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={84}
 C(z)=\frac{1}{1-Z_{\geq1}(z)}=\frac{1}{1-\frac{z}{1-z}}=\frac{1-z}{1-2z}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6ab6af6d3b29917fa077422bcdbe8917]%mdk

$A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={93}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[709ffc465cba3b81153d16705a362a44]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={95}
PSET(a_1,\ldots,a_n) = (\emptyset+\{a_1\})\times(\emptyset+\{a_2\})\times\cdots\times(\emptyset + \{a_n\})
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

$P(z)=\sum_{m=0}^nP_m z^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[164ad8bb8e2c661d087405b5859a2b7f]%mdk
$S \subset A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={108}

$S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={108}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c1ab68d317b7b263fb9e31604987145d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={110}

\]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={112}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[4cb54a944f8a0e8fbae5c9616bae2a80]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={114}
P_{\leq n} = \{S\subset A||S|\leq n\} = \prod_{\substack{a\in A\\|a|\leq n}}(\emptyset+\{a\})
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={116}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ab45d3bfb9608582184520ca67f39f00]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={118}
P_{\leq n}(z)=\prod_{m\leq n}(1+z^m)^{A_m}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={120}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3629cc0747588690e68ca5fb992aa1e4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={122}
P=PSET(A)=\prod_{a\in A}(\emptyset + \{a\})\text{, with }
P(z)=\prod_{m}(1+z^m)^{A_m} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={125}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[404038143de4bcd0eac3862b09d1aa4e]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={127}
P(z) = \exp\Bigl(\sum_m A_m\log(1+z^m)\Bigr)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={129}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3dbb58e988a8902ccc8d36f0cdad0a6a]%mdk
$\log(1+u)=\sum_{k\geq 1}(-1)^{k+1}\,\frac{u^k}{k}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={129}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[f62d677497515d977793cce77a1f1d21]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={132}
\begin{aligned}
P(z) & = \exp\Bigl(\sum_m A_m\sum_{k\geq1}(-1)^{k+1}\,\frac{z^{mk}}{k}\Bigr)\\
     & = \exp\Bigl(\sum_{k\geq1}\frac{(-1)^{k+1}}{k}\sum_m A_m (z^k)^m\Bigr)\\
     & = \exp\Bigl(\sum_{k\geq1}\frac{(-1)^{k+1}}{k} A(z^k)\Bigr) 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={275}
